mapper.select: select * from (select rownum R, A.* from (select * from agencyrequest where director=#{director} order by num asc) A) where R between #{startRow} and #{lastRow}
select count(num) from agencyrequest where director=#{director}
select * from (select rownum R, A.* from (select * from agencyrequest where commit=1 order by num asc) A) where R between #{startRow1} and #{lastRow1}
select count(num) from agencyrequest where commit=1
select * from (select rownum R, A.* from (select * from agencyrequest where commit=0 order by num asc) A) where R between #{startRow2} and #{lastRow2}
select count(num) from agencyrequest where commit=0
mapper.update: update agencyrequest set title=#{title}, pubdate=#{pubdate}, fname=#{fname}, oname=#{oname} where num=#{num}
mapper.insert: insert into agencyrequest values(NVL((select max(num) from agencyrequest)+1,1), #{title}, #{director}, #{pubdate}, #{fname}, #{oname}, 0)
mapper.update: update agencyrequest set commit=1 where num=#{num}
update agencyrequest set commit=0 where num=#{num}
